metadata.title: CVE-2019-9037 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in libmatio.a in matio (aka MAT File I/O Library)1.5.13. There is a buffer over-read in the function Mat_VarPrint() inmat.c.

criterions.comment: libmatio: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
